comments.comments_text: Trent Alexander-Arnold (Liverpool) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger.

comments.comments_text: Liverpool have a chance to score from a corner kick, but the ball is cleared by a defender.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] have a chance to score from a corner kick, but the ball is cleared by a defender.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Trent Alexander-Arnold sends a long raking pass onto the head of Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool), who makes no mistake from close in and sends the ball into the bottom left corner. 1:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: It's a goal! [PLAYER] sends a long raking pass onto the head of [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), who makes no mistake from close in and sends the ball into the bottom left corner. 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Robert Snodgrass (West Ham) launches the ball from the resulting corner, but one of the defenders is first to the ball and deals with the threat.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) launches the ball from the resulting corner, but one of the defenders is first to the ball and deals with the threat.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Felipe Anderson (West Ham) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger. It will be a corner kick for West Ham.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger. It will be a corner kick for [TEAM].

comments.comments_text: West Ham force a corner. They send men into the box.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] force a corner. They send men into the box.

comments.comments_text: Issa Diop (West Ham) outjumps the defence inside the six-yard box to meet the corner kick and scores with a great header into the bottom right corner. The goalkeeper had no chance to react. The score is now 1:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) outjumps the defence inside the six-yard box to meet the corner kick and scores with a great header into the bottom right corner. The goalkeeper had no chance to react. The score is now 1:1.

comments.comments_text: The goalkeeper punched the ball away after Trent Alexander-Arnold (Liverpool) took the corner.

comments.comments_text: Robert Snodgrass (West Ham) sends a wonderful cross from the corner kick. However, the defence works perfectly to clear the ball and avert the threat.
